about_the_game:
Jump into the football boots and try to score as many goals as you can. You vs goalkeeper, who will score more goals and who will delight the audience more?

Gameplay

You play versus AI goalkeeper who can not only defend his own goal, but he can also shoot and sometimes score if you are not prepared to defend. Play as much as you can without any time limit and train your dribbling and shooting skills. There are three types of shot (straight shot, chip shot, finesse shot) that you can use in various situations. You can dribble past the goalkeeper and score, but you must be cautious because if you get too close to goalkeeper he will use sliding tackle on you and you will end up on the ground. Every ball bounce is covered with sound effect depending on what is hit. There are 40 fans beside the pitch waiting to see and celebrate some spectacular goals.

Future additions

  • More different venues and surfaces: Concrete, Grass, Sand...
  • Full player customization
  • Full player moves: Pass, Tackle, Header, Dive...
  • Dribbling skills
  • Online 1v1
  • Online Teams and Transfers
  • Big soccer stadiums for large amount of players (5v5 and more)
  • VR
  • and much more

Manual
Use WASD or arrow keys to move and mouse to look.
Hold SHIFT to sprint (sprint is available only when going forward)
LMB = straight shot
Z + LMB = finesse shot
C + LMB = chip shot
Shot power depends on how long you hold LMB

The possibilities for new features are endless, so I expect to hear some very good advices from the Community!

You can dribble past the goalkeeper and score, but you must be cautious because if you get too close to goalkeeper he will use sliding tackle on you and you will end up on the ground. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-3770 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon RX 480
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.3+, Open CL 1.0+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 4.1+, Open CL 1.2+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Soccer Simulation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 32 or 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 32 or 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-3770 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is the first person soccer game. As the name itself says this is a realistic soccer simulation including realistic ball and net physics and realistic sound effects. Everyone who loves soccer (football) must love this game.
